info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern El Paso County through 245 PM MDT... At 214 PM MDT, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Falcon, or 14 miles northeast of Colorado Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Peyton around 225 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Calhan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
